definition: not to mention (idiom); to say not one word/fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
only/merely/just/but
grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
variant of 只[zhi3]
variant of 只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
(negative prefix)/not/no
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: I notice she says nothing about a fear of snakes.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到她对关于蛇的恐惧只字不提。

sentences.english: You'd better be silent about what happened.
sentences.chinese: 对于所发生之事你最好只字不提。

sentences.english: The communique & 1 & made no mention of progress on any of the issues.
sentences.chinese: 公报只字不提这些问题中哪个问题取得了进展。

sentences.english: Soviet authorities were absolutely silent about this aspect of the siege.
sentences.chinese: 苏联当局对围城战的这一面只字不提。

sentences.english: She didn't breathe a word to him.
Sophia made no remark as to Gerald's lie to her.
sentences.chinese: 对于杰拉尔德对她撒谎的事儿，索非娅只字不提。

definition: lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
to not mention a single word (about sth) (idiom)
to refuse to say anything about (idiom)/to remain tight-lipped/to avoid mentioning
(idiom) reluctant to speak about it/tight-lipped
important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
to be well aware
not knowing anything at all (idiom); completely ignorant/without an inkling
lit. to guard one's mouth like a closed bottle (idiom); tight-lipped/reticent/not breathing a word
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to settle a matter by leaving it unsettled/to end up with nothing definite
to deny flatly
to play deaf-mute
